pages.text:
Title: A neighborhood in which the Van Der Waerden permanent conjecture is valid

Abstract: We show that if A is n ×n doubly stochasticn > 2, and if then per is the Euclidean norm; Jn is the n×n matrix whose entries are all n −

Keywords: Combinatorics, Physics, Composite material, Political science, Materials science, Law, Geometry, Mathematics, Quantum mechanics
